Text.Language: Arip~recbeuin e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ piar,/aggeloc e#y#u#: Gabri/l pifaisennoufi: n~tef,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Intercede on our behalf, O the holy archangel, Gabriel the Announcer, that He may forgive us our sins.
